reviewText: These people have saved countless lives and prevented untold suffering. I know the clinic for over 25 years when they started as a small storefront on Avenue C, when very few professionals wanted to help the type of clients, and harm reduction was in its infancy. They probably have as much or more collective knowledge on the subject than any entity I can think of. The authors knowledge comes from experience of serving hundreds of clients every day for many years. Clientele from diverse backgrounds and social strata who all have 1 thing in common, An addiction that consumes their lives if gone untreated
